item.title: Added resend
item.description: https://resend.com - Transactional emails API for developers. 3,000 emails/month, 100 emails/day free, 1 custom domain.

item.title: Updated Storj Free Plan limits
item.description: https://storj.io/ - Decentralised Private Cloud Storage for Apps and Developers. Free plan provides 1 Project, 25 GB storage, 25 GB bandwidth per month.

item.title: update require
item.description: https://www.scaleway.com/en/object-storage/) — S3-Compatible Object Storage. Free 75 GB storage and external outgoing traffic(credit card required - S3-Compatible Object Storage. Free 75 GB storage and external outgoing traffic(credit card required).

item.title: Remove 1 entry in Web Hosting section
Add OpenReplay
item.description: https://www.openreplay.com - Open-source session replay with devtools for bug reproduction, live session for real-time support, and product analytics suite. 1,000 sessions/month with access to all features and 7-day retention.

item.title: Add robusta.dev (kubernetes monitoring)
item.description: https://home.robusta.dev/ - Powerful Kubernetes monitoring, based on Prometheus. Bring your own Prometheus or install the all-in-one bundle. Free tier includes up to 20 Kubernetes nodes. Alerts via Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord, and more. Integrations with PagerDuty, OpsGenie, VictorOps, DataDog, and many other tools.
